$comment: Amazon product type definition for PERSONAL_COMPUTER product type

item_name.title: Title
item_name.description: Provide a title for the item that may be customer facing

value.title: Item Name
value.description: Provide a title for the item that may be customer facing
examples: Sony QuietComfort Noise Cancelling Wireless Headphones

brand.title: Brand Name
brand.description: The brand name of the product. This may be different from the name of the manufacturer of the product

value.title: Brand Name
value.description: Provide the brand name of the product

externally_assigned_product_identifier.title: External Product ID
externally_assigned_product_identifier.description: Provide the external ID (barcode) type and corresponding value that is being used to identify the product

type.title: External Product ID Type
type.description: Select the type of external ID (barcode) that is being used to identify this product

value.title: External Product ID
value.description: Provide the corresponding external product id value based on the type that was selected

merchant_suggested_asin.title: Merchant Suggested ASIN
merchant_suggested_asin.description: Provide an ASIN for your product if one exists. If a value is not provided, the system will attempt a match based on the External Product ID.

value.title: Merchant Suggested ASIN
value.description: Provide an ASIN for your product if one exists. If a value is not provided, the system will attempt a match based on the External Product ID.

supplier_declared_has_product_identifier.title: Is exempt from a supplier declared external identifier
supplier_declared_has_product_identifier.description: Please specify if the product is exempt from supplier declared external product identifiers.

value.title: Is exempt from supplier declared external product identifier
value.description: Please specify if the product is exempt from supplier declared external product identifiers.

recommended_browse_nodes.title: Recommended Browse Node
recommended_browse_nodes.description: The browse node the item should be assigned to. Please consult the Browse Tree Guide for more information and to find the best node for your product. It is very important that you categorise your product correctly; if you don't provide a node, or if you provide an incorrect node, customers may not be able to find your product easily

value.title: Recommended Browse Nodes
value.description: Indicate the browse node or section of the Amazon website where the product will sit. This allows customers to find the product on the website easily.

package_level.title: Package Level
package_level.description: Provide the package level of the item. Choose “Unit” when package hierarchy is not provided or applicable. Provide one “Unit” item for every package hierarchy.

value.title: Package Level
value.description: Provide the package level of the item. Choose “Unit” when package hierarchy is not provided or applicable. Provide one “Unit” item for every package hierarchy.

package_contains_sku.title: Package Contains SKU
package_contains_sku.description: Provide the SKU and quantity of the child items contained in the next package level.

quantity.title: Package Contains SKU Quantity
quantity.description: Provide the quantity of each unit, case, or pallet identified in Package Level.

sku.title: Package Contains SKU Identifier
sku.description: Provide the SKU identifier of each unit, case or pallet identified in Package Level.

model_number.title: Model Number
model_number.description: The model number of the product, as assigned by the manufacturer. Note that this should be distinct from Model Name and Manufacturer Part Number

value.title: Model Number
value.description: Provide the manufacturer 's model number for the item

model_name.title: Model Name
model_name.description: An alphanumeric string; 1 character minimum in length and 50 characters maximum in length.

value.title: Model Name
value.description: Specify the model name of the product as defined by the manufacturer or brand excluding item type, colour, brand or size
examples: Juliet, MacBook Pro, Rebel, iPhone, Xbox One

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: The manufacturer of the product. This may be different from the brand name used to market the product

value.title: Manufacturer
value.description: Specify the manufacturer of the product

value.title: Model Year
value.description: Specify the item's model year

skip_offer.title: Skip Offer
skip_offer.description: Please indicate whether the offer should be skipped and a buyable offer should not be created. A value of "Yes", means no offer will be created.

value.title: Skip Offer
value.description: Please indicate whether the offer should be skipped and a buyable offer should not be created. A value of "Yes", means no offer will be created.

fulfillment_availability.title: Fulfillment Availability
fulfillment_availability.description: For those merchants using Amazon fulfillment services, please provide associated logistical information.

fulfillment_channel_code.title: Fulfillment Channel Code
fulfillment_channel_code.description: For those merchants using Amazon fulfillment services, this designates which fulfillment network will be used. Specifying a value other than DEFAULT will cancel the Merchant-fulfilled offering.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Enter the quantity of the item you are making available for sale. This is your current inventory commitment (as a whole number)

lead_time_to_ship_max_days.title: Handling Time
lead_time_to_ship_max_days.description: Provide the time, in days, between when you receive an order for an item and when you can ship the item

restock_date.title: Restock Date
restock_date.description: Date that product will be restocked

is_inventory_available.title: Inventory Always Available
is_inventory_available.description: Always available inventory is an alternative to quantity that allows inventory to never deplete. Enabling or disabling will toggle this feature on or off. Note that a quantity cannot be specified when provided.

value.title: Minimum Advertised Price Display
value.description: Select one.

purchasable_offer.title: Purchasable Offer
purchasable_offer.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer of the product

map_price.title: Purchasable Offer Map Price
map_price.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Map Price of the product

schedule.title: Purchasable Offer Map Price Schedule
schedule.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Map Price Schedule of the product

our_price.title: Purchasable Offer Our Price
our_price.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Our Price of the product

schedule.title: Purchasable Offer Our Price Schedule
schedule.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Our Price Schedule of the product

value_with_tax.title: Your Price
value_with_tax.description: Provide base price of the item at which it is being offered to the intended buyer segment

rule_id.title: Pricing Rule
rule_id.description: The pricing rule that will automate price on this offer

minimum_seller_allowed_price.title: Purchasable Offer Minimum Seller Allowed Price
minimum_seller_allowed_price.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Minimum Seller Allowed Price of the product

schedule.title: Purchasable Offer Minimum Seller Allowed Price Schedule
schedule.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Minimum Seller Allowed Price Schedule of the product

value_with_tax.title: Minimum Seller Alllowed Price
value_with_tax.description: Provide the minimum seller allowed price

maximum_seller_allowed_price.title: Purchasable Offer Maximum Seller Allowed Price
maximum_seller_allowed_price.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Maximum Seller Allowed Price of the product

schedule.title: Purchasable Offer Maximum Seller Allowed Price Schedule
schedule.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Maximum Seller Allowed Price Schedule of the product

value_with_tax.title: Maximum Seller Allowed Price
value_with_tax.description: Provide the maximum seller allowed price

discounted_price.title: Purchasable Offer Discounted Price
discounted_price.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Discounted Price of the product

schedule.title: Purchasable Offer Discounted Price Schedule
schedule.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Discounted Price Schedule of the product

value_with_tax.title: Sale Price
value_with_tax.description: The price at which you offer the product for sale.

start_at.title: Sale Start Date
start_at.description: The date that the sale price will begin to override the product's standard price; the sale price will be displayed after 0:00AM of Sale From Date.

end_at.title: Sale End Date
end_at.description: The last date that the sale price will override the item's standard price; the product's standard price will be displayed after 0:00AM of Sale End Date.

start_at.title: Purchasable Offer Start At
start_at.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Start At of the product

value.title: Offering Release Date
value.description: Your price start date

end_at.title: Purchasable Offer End At
end_at.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer End At of the product

value.title: Stop Selling Date
value.description: Your price end date

audience.title: Audience
audience.description: Provide the intended buyer segment or program that this purchasable offer is applicable to.

quantity_discount_plan.title: Purchasable Business Offer Quantity Discount Plan
quantity_discount_plan.description: Provide and define the quantity discount plan for your business price.
examples: Schedule Quantity Price Type: Fixed; Schedule Levels Quantity Lower Bound: 5; Schedule Levels Quantity Price: 10

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description: Provide the details, such as dates, pricing type that define your scheduled quantity discount plan.
examples: Quantity price start date: 06/30/2024; Quantity price end date: 07/01/2024

discount_type.title: Quantity Price Type
discount_type.description: Provide whether the quantity price type is fixed, a price set in local currency for each quantity threshold, or a percentage of business price

lower_bound.title: Quantity Threshold (Lower Bound)
lower_bound.description: Provide the minimum purchase quantity necessary to receive the discount. It will apply to all units if the quantity threshold is met.

value.title: Quantity Price (Fixed Price/Percentage Discount)
value.description: Provide the quantity price for each quantity threshold or the discount percentage offered on the business price for each quantity threshold.

condition_type.title: Item Condition
condition_type.description: Provide the actual condition type of the product

value.title: Item Condition
value.description: Provide the actual condition type of the product

condition_note.title: Item Condition Note
condition_note.description: Descriptive text explaining the actual condition of the item
examples: Small dent in left side panel

value.title: Offer Condition Note
value.description: Provide descriptive text explaining the actual condition of the item
examples: Small dent in left side panel.

list_price.title: List Price
list_price.description: Provide the list price for the product. List Price is the suggested retail price of a product as provided by a manufacturer, supplier, or seller. This is not the offering or cost price.

value_with_tax.title: List Price with Tax
value_with_tax.description: Provide the list price for the product including the tax. List price is often referred to as the manufacturer's suggested retail price (MSRP) or the recommended retail price (RRP) set by the manufacturer and provided by the manufacturer, supplier, or seller. This is not the offering or cost price. If you are unable to provide a value, enter 0.

product_tax_code.title: Product Tax Code
product_tax_code.description: Enter the product tax code supplied to you by Amazon.com

value.title: Product Tax Code
value.description: Enter the product tax code supplied to you by Amazon.com

merchant_release_date.title: Release Date
merchant_release_date.description: The first date on which you can deliver a pre-orderable product (one that has never been available prior to this date) to a customer

value.title: Release Date
value.description: Provide the merchant release date using YYYY-MM-DD format

merchant_shipping_group.title: Merchant Shipping Group
merchant_shipping_group.description: The ship configuration group for an offer. The ship configuration group is created and managed by the seller through the ship setting UI.

value.title: Merchant Shipping Group
value.description: The ship configuration group for an offer. The ship configuration group is created and managed by the seller through the ship setting UI.

max_order_quantity.title: Max Order Quantity
max_order_quantity.description: The maximum quantity of the product that a customer may purchase in one order

value.title: Maximum Order Quantity
value.description: Max order quantity.

can_be_messaged.title: Offering Can Be Gift Messaged
can_be_messaged.description: If you can print a gift message with the item indicate that here. If left blank, defaults to 'No'

can_be_wrapped.title: Is Gift Wrap Available
can_be_wrapped.description: If you can gift wrap an item indicate that here.  If left blank, defaults to 'No'

main_offer_image_locator.title: Main Offer Image Locator
main_offer_image_locator.description: Provide the location of the image

media_location.title: Main Image Location
media_location.description: The URL where the main offer-specific image of the product is located

other_offer_image_locator_1.title: Other Offer Image Locator
other_offer_image_locator_1.description: Provide the location of the image

media_location.title: Other Image Location
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_offer_image_locator_2.title: Other Offer Image Locator
other_offer_image_locator_2.description: Provide the location of the image

media_location.title: Other Image Location
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_offer_image_locator_3.title: Other Offer Image Locator
other_offer_image_locator_3.description: Provide the location of the image

media_location.title: Other Image Location
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_offer_image_locator_4.title: Other Offer Image Locator
other_offer_image_locator_4.description: Provide the location of the image

media_location.title: Other Image Location
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_offer_image_locator_5.title: Other Offer Image Locator
other_offer_image_locator_5.description: Provide the location and source of the image

media_location.title: Other Image Location
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

supplemental_condition_information.title: Supplemental Condition Information
supplemental_condition_information.description: Provide the additional condition information on the non-new product.
examples: iPhone 14, Open Box Never Used, OEM, Original, Greater than 90%, With Tags, Pristine, Fully Functional

accessories.title: Accessories
accessories.description: Provide the type of accessory included in the non-new product.

battery_life_percentage.title: Battery Life Percentage
battery_life_percentage.description: Provide the battery health information of the non-new product if it includes batteries.

cosmetic.title: Cosmetic
cosmetic.description: Provide the overall cosmetic condition of the non-new product.

features.title: Features
features.description: Provide the refurbishment type of the non-new product.

functional_condition.title: Functional Condition
functional_condition.description: Provide the functional condition of the non-new product.

packaging.title: Packaging
packaging.description: Provide the packaging type of the non-new product

source_type.title: Source Type
source_type.description: Provide the information on how the non-new product was sourced.

handmade_classification.title: Handmade Classification
handmade_classification.description: Select the value that best describes how the product was produced

value.title: Handmade Classification
value.description: Select the value that best describes how the product was produced

product_description.title: Product Description
product_description.description: A text description of the product. Please provide as much factual descriptive information as possible and avoid subjective or time-sensitive comments eg. "great value" or "hot this year". Remember that this description will be used by all sellers - do not include detail specific to your listings, eg. promotional or shipping information. If you see #### signs where you should see the text, clear the format of the cell (check Help for your vision of Excel for instructions)
examples: The compact and affordable EF-S 55-250mm f/4-5.6 IS offers powerful telephoto performance. Its 4-stop Image Stabilizer with automatic panning detection effectively suppresses blur in low light. The EF-S 55-250mm f/4-5.6 IS  a telephoto zoom lens combining powerful performance with high image quality. With a focal length equivalent of 88-400mm in 35mm format, it is ideal for photographers seeking an affordable, versatile lens for general-purpose telephoto photography. To combat the effects of camera shake, the EF-S 55-250mm f/4-5.6 IS incorporates Canon's latest 4-stop compensation Image Stabilizer technology. This allows the use of shutter speeds up to 4 times slower with no perceptible increase in image blur. Automatic panning detection automatically turns off the Image Stabilizer in either the horizontal or vertical direction when following moving subjects. The EF-S 55-250mm f/4-5.6 IS employs a Canon UD (Ultra-low Dispersion) lens element to suppress the effects of secondary chromatic aberrations - for crisp, sharp, high-contrast images without fringing throughout the zoom range.

value.title: Product Description
value.description: Provide a description of the product. This information will appear in paragraph form on the detail page of your product. Include unique product features, product line details and product specifications. Do not use all caps
examples: This summer, boots by Jette made from high quality suede leather are real gems. They visually highlight the craftsmanship and fine leather braid positioned at the top of the shaft

bullet_point.title: Product Attributes Bullet Points
bullet_point.description: Use bullet-point1 to bullet-point 5 to provide short sentences that summarise your product. A customer should be able to understand from these sentences what your product does, and may then decide to read the product description for more detail. Keep this information factual and descriptive - do not include subjective adjectives eg "awesome", great". Do not include the model numbers your product is compatible with (use compatible-devices for this instead). Remember that these bullet points will be used by all sellers - do not include detail specific to your listings, eg. your business name or "Free Shipping"
examples:
46-inch full HD 3D TV with Edge LED, Motionflow XR 200, Internet video and Skype
Clear, smooth 3D and 2D picture quality
Watch Internet videos and make free Skype calls
Save time and energy with smart features
Built-in tuner for easy access to Freeview HD

value.title: Bullet Point
value.description: Customer facing field, include key features and benefits. Bullet format, no punctuations. Do NOT use all caps or abbreviations. Please do NOT use for fabric, care instructions, or country, these are populated in different fields.
examples: Breathable leather lining, Classic look and feel

generic_keyword.title: Search Terms
generic_keyword.description: A word or short phrase that describes the product. Only use if your product title does not already include the word/phrase, and you think customers are likely to be searching for that word/phrase. For example, if your product title  is "Kingston DataTraveler 101 Gen 2 8GB USB Drive - Red", you could include the keywords "usb stick" and "flash drive" so that customers searching for those terms will find it. Do not use keywords for  common misspellings (Amazon's search engine is smart enough to figure those out) or brand names (we will pick this up from the brand-name column)

value.title: Generic Keyword
value.description: Provide any terms that may be relevant to customer searches
examples: Water sport shoes; Derek Rose; Electric; Wi-Fi; Banana

special_feature.title: Product Features
special_feature.description: Describe any special features the product has - one in each column. Keep this information factual and descriptive - do not include subjective adjectives eg "awesome", great". Do not include the model numbers your product is compatible with (use compatible-devices for this instead). Remember that this information will be used by all sellers - do not include detail specific to your listings, eg. your business name or "Free Shipping"

value.title: Special Features
value.description: Describe features that are highly product specific, and not part of any larger value set
examples: Dishwasher Safe, Flame Resistant, Non-Marking Sole

value.title: Style
value.description: Provide the style of the product. Style refers to the aesthetic choices of a person or a group of people. It describes the distinctive visual representation of a product

number_of_items.title: Number of Items
number_of_items.description: The number of items that are included in the product

value.title: Number of Items
value.description: Provide the total number of identical items in the selling unit to the customer

item_package_quantity.title: Package Quantity
item_package_quantity.description: How many items are in the packaging?

value.title: Item Package Quantity
value.description: Provide the number of packages sold as part of a single item. An ASIN selling 5 boxes of paperclips with 100 paperclips per box would have item package quantity = '5'

display.title: Display Colour Support
display.description: Please describe the colour support capability of the product.

resolution_maximum.title: Maximum Display Resolution
resolution_maximum.description: The maximum display resolution supported by a TV or camcorder

value.title: Display Resolution Maximum
value.description: Provide the product's maximum display resolution as a numeric value

size.title: Screen Size
size.description: The screen size of the product

value.title: Screen Size
value.description: Provide the size of the screen as a numeric value

type.title: Display Type
type.description: Provide the type of screen the item uses to display visuals, such as LCD, LED, or OLED, which affects image quality.

value.title: Display Type
value.description: Provide the product's display type

color.title: Colour
color.description: Provide the colour of the product

value.title: Colour
value.description: Provide the colour of the product

size.title: Size
size.description: The numeric or text version of the item's size.

value.title: Size
value.description: Provide the size of the item

part_number.title: Manufacturer Part Number
part_number.description: If applicable, please submit the manufacturer's part number for the product.  For most products, this will be identical to the model number; however, some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number

value.title: Part Number
value.description: Provide the part number. For many products, this will be identical to the model number however some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number

item_shape.title: Shape
item_shape.description: The shape of the speaker (typically used for in-wall or in-ceiling speakers)

value.title: Item Shape
value.description: Specify the shape of the item

graphics_processor_manufacturer.title: Video Processor
graphics_processor_manufacturer.description: Provide the company that manufactured the graphics processing unit integrated into the product.

value.title: Graphics Processor Manufacturer
value.description: Provide the company that manufactured the graphics processing unit integrated into the product.

series_id.title: Series ID
series_id.description: Provide the series ID of the product

value.title: Series ID
value.description: Provide the series ID of the product

edition.title: Edition
edition.description: Provide the version or edition of the item

value.title: Edition
value.description: Provide the version or edition of the item

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: Indicate the configuration of the item

value.title: Configuration
value.description: Indicate the configuration of the item

graphics_description.title: Graphics Description
graphics_description.description: List the type of graphics card in your computer.

value.title: Graphics Description
value.description: Specify the type of graphics card

value.title: Keyboard Description
value.description: Specify the keyboard type

platform_for_display.title: Platform for Display
platform_for_display.description: Provide the platform associated with the product.

value.title: Platform for Display
value.description: Provide the platform associated with the product.

processor_description.title: Processor Description
processor_description.description: Provide the processor included with the item as specified by the brand and series or generation indicators.
examples: Intel Pentium, BIONZ, EXR Processor II

value.title: Processor Description
value.description: Provide the processor included with the item as specified by the brand and series or generation indicators.
examples: Intel Pentium, BIONZ, EXR Processor II

language.title: Language
language.description: Select the appropriate language from the list of valid values

value.title: Language
value.description: Select the appropriate language from the list of valid values

value.title: Processor Count
value.description: Provide the number of processors

system_ram_type.title: RAM Type
system_ram_type.description: Provide the type of memory chips used in the item, which temporarily stores data and instructions for the computer to run programs.

value.title: RAM Type
value.description: Specify the type of memory the item comes with

aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Provide the proportional relationship between the width and height of the item's display screen.

value.title: Aspect Ratio
value.description: Specify the aspect ratio of the product

speaker_description.title: Speaker Description
speaker_description.description: Please describe functionalities or features of speakers. Separate individual features with a ','.

value.title: Speaker Description
value.description: Please describe functionalities or features of speakers. Separate individual features with a ','.

memory_speed.title: Memory Speed
memory_speed.description: Provide the memory speed for the item

value.title: Memory Speed
value.description: Provide the memory speed for the item as a numeric value

hardware_interface.title: Hardware Interface
hardware_interface.description: Provide the way the item connects to other devices, the ports and sockets it has for data transfer and peripherals.

value.title: Hardware Interface
value.description: Specify the method of connecting to or from this device

resolution.title: Resolution
resolution.description: Number of horizontal lines of vertical resolution.  Values can be designated as either in progressive scan (p) or interlaced scan (i).

value.title: Resolution
value.description: Provide the name of the product's resolution

video_output.title: Video Output
video_output.description: Provide the type of video connection supported by the product to connect it with a display device.

value.title: Video Output
value.description: Provide the type of video connection supported by the product to connect it with a display device.

graphics_coprocessor.title: Graphics Coprocessor
graphics_coprocessor.description: Provide the dedicated hardware component that renders graphics for the item, enhancing visual quality and performance.

value.title: Graphics Coprocessor
value.description: Provide the type of graphics coprocessor used by the item to perform image rendering functions.
examples: Intel HD Graphics, AMD Radeon HD 6750M

enum: AMD Radeon RX Vega M GH
enumNames: AMD Radeon RX Vega M GH

connectivity_technology.title: Network Connectivity Technology
connectivity_technology.description: How the product connects to a network

value.title: Connectivity Technology
value.description: Specify the product's connectivity technology

specification_met.title: Specification Met
specification_met.description: Provide the technical standards or requirements the item meets, indicating its capabilities and performance level.

value.title: Specification Met
value.description: Specify any specifications that the product has met
examples: Energy Star, EPEAT Bronze, EPEAT Gold

power_plug_type.title: Power Plug Type
power_plug_type.description: The mains power plug type of the product

value.title: Power Plug
value.description: Specify the type of power plug the item has or supports

accepted_voltage_frequency.title: Accepted Voltage Frequency
accepted_voltage_frequency.description: Select the maximum acceptable voltage and associated frequency that the product is capable of supporting

value.title: Accepted Voltage Frequency
value.description: Select the maximum acceptable voltage and associated frequency that the product is capable of supporting
enumNames: 100 to 240 Volts and 50 Hertz to 60 Hertz

memory_storage_capacity.title: Memory Storage Capacity
memory_storage_capacity.description: How many megbytes can the memory chip hold.  Please only use Megabytes!

value.title: Memory Storage Capacity
value.description: Provide the item's memory storage capacity as a numeric value

native_resolution.title: Native Resolution
native_resolution.description: The native resolution of the item.

value.title: Native Resolution
value.description: Provide the item's native resolution

cooling_method.title: Cooling Method
cooling_method.description: Specify how the cooling function of the product works

value.title: Cooling Method
value.description: Specify how the cooling function of the product works

operating_system.title: Operating Systems
operating_system.description: The operating system that the product uses

value.title: Operating System
value.description: Specify the product's operating system
examples: Mac OS X 10.13 High Sierra, Windows 10 Home

wireless_comm_standard.title: Wireless Compability
wireless_comm_standard.description: Provide the wireless communication standard used by the item as defined by the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE).

value.title: Wireless Communication Standard
value.description: Provide the wireless communication standard used by the item as defined by the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE).

value.title: Product Grade
value.description: Product Grade

value.title: Customer Package Type
value.description: Provide the products package type

included_security_features.title: Security Features
included_security_features.description: Provide the security measures built into the item to protect data and prevent unauthorized access.

value.title: Security Features
value.description: What type of security features are included in this bag? Indicate if this product can be locked, has hidden compartments, or other security features.

graphics_card_interface.title: Graphics Card Interface
graphics_card_interface.description: Provide the specific interface compatible with the item. The interface is the plug that connects an item with a motherboard.

value.title: Graphics Card Interface
value.description: Provide the specific interface compatible with the item. The interface is the plug that connects an item with a motherboard.

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description: Provide the most prominent repeated decorative design of the item

value.title: Pattern
value.description: Provide the most prominent repeated decorative design of the item

compatible_devices.title: Compatible Devices
compatible_devices.description: Provide the devices that are compatible with this item. A compatible device is designed to work with the item without modification.

value.title: Compatible Devices
value.description: Provide the devices that are compatible with this item. A compatible device is designed to work with the item without modification.
examples: Asus MyPal A620BT, Casio Cassiopeia E-100

speaker_type.title: Speaker Type
speaker_type.description: Provide the type of speakers the item uses for audio output, the components that produce sound from electrical signals.

value.title: Speaker Type
value.description: Please enter the type / design of a loudspeaker.

wireless_communication_technology.title: Wireless Technology Type
wireless_communication_technology.description: The wireless signal type used by the product

value.title: Wireless Communication Technology
value.description: Provide the item's wireless communication technology

memory_slots_available.title: Available Memory Slots

batteries_included.description: Are batteries included with the product?

value.description: Provide the item’s battery IEC code. IEC is standardized alphanumeric nomenclature based on battery size & type available on battery itself.

weight.title: Battery Weight
weight.description: Provide the total net weight of the batteries included. This is the weight of the standalone batteries not including packaging or the device it may be used in

num_batteries.title: Number of Batteries
num_batteries.description: Provide the quantity and type of batteries needed to power the item.  If batteries are included with the item be sure to account for spare batteries provided

number_of_lithium_metal_cells.title: Number of Lithium Metal Cells
number_of_lithium_metal_cells.description: Total number of Lithium cells (of type "Metal") in the product,  where the cell isn't contained in an encased battery.

value.title: Number of Lithium Metal Cells

number_of_lithium_ion_cells.title: Number of Lithium-ion Cells
number_of_lithium_ion_cells.description: Total number of Lithium cells (of type "Ion") in the product,  where the cell isn't contained in an encased battery.

examples: Batteries contained in equipment, Batteries packed with equipment, Batteries only

value.title: Lithium Battery Weight

item_weight.title: Item Weight

value.description: Provide the item weight numeric value (not including the packaging)

eu_spare_part_availability_duration.title: EU Spare Part Availability Duration

dsa_responsible_party_address.description: Provide the email address or URL for the EU Responsible Person to comply with the General Product Safety Regulation (GPSR). If you’ve already submitted this Responsible Person’s information in the past, make sure you use the same email or URL.

value.title: Responsible Person's Email or Electronic Address
value.description: Provide the email address or URL for the EU Responsible Person to comply with the General Product Safety Regulation (GPSR). If you’ve already submitted this Responsible Person’s information in the past, make sure you use the same email or URL.

compliance_media.title: Compliance Media
compliance_media.description: Provide information on the product documents you want to display on the product detail page to comply with the General Product Safety Regulation (GPSR). Alternatively, you can upload images under the PS01-PS06 variants in the Image Manager.

content_language.title: Compliance Media Language

gpsr_safety_attestation.title: GPSR Safety Attestation
gpsr_safety_attestation.description: Check “yes” if your product doesn’t have any warning and safety information, as it can be used safely and as intended without it.

value.description: Provide "in equipment" for batteries installed in devices, "with equipment" for those packed separately with the device, and "only" for standalone batteries.

length.title: Item Length
length.description: Provide the length of the item

value.title: Item Length
value.description: Provide the item length numeric value

width.title: Item Width
width.description: Provide the width of the item

value.title: Item Width
value.description: Provide the item width numeric value

height.title: Item Height
height.description: Provide the height of the item

value.title: Item Height
value.description: Provide the item height numeric value

value.title: Item Package Length
value.description: Provide the package length value (numeric)

value.title: Item Package Width
value.description: Provide the package width value (numeric)

value.title: Item Package Height
value.description: Provide the package height value (numeric)

value.title: Item Package Weight
value.description: Provide the item package weight (numeric)

epr_product_packaging.title: EPR Product Packaging
epr_product_packaging.description: Provide the main material, granular materials, and weight and percentage of recycled content of the granular materials of the product packaging.

main_material.title: EPR Product Packaging Main Material
main_material.description: Provide the main material of the product packaging.

granular_materials.title: EPR Product Packaging Granular Materials
granular_materials.description: Provide the granular materials, their weight including the unit, and the percentage of recycled content of the granular materials of the product packaging.

granular_material.title: EPR Product Packaging Granular Material
granular_material.description: Provide the granular material of the product packaging.

weight.title: EPR Product Packaging Granular Material Weight Value
weight.description: Provide the weight of the granular material of the product packaging.

value.title: EPR Product Packaging Granular Material Weight Value
value.description: Provide the weight of the granular material of the product packaging.

unit.title: EPR Product Packaging Granular Material Weight Unit
unit.description: Provide the corresponding unit used to designate the weight of the granular material of the product packaging.

recycled_content_percentage.title: Percentage of Recycled Content of Granular Material of EPR Product Packaging
recycled_content_percentage.description: Provide the percentage of recycled content of the granular material of the product packaging.
